quote: People who bite the hand that feeds them usually lick the boot that kicks them.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: The hard path is often the right one. The river teaches more than the shore.
author: Maxime Lagace

quote: Genius is the ability to act rightly without precedent - the power to do the right thing the first time.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Making money isn't hard in itself... What's hard is to earn it doing something worth devoting one's life to.
author: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

quote: If you want more luck, take more chances.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: The happiest people in the world are those who feel absolutely terrific about themselves.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: It is not fair to ask of others what you are not willing to do yourself.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: People inspire you, or they drain you. Pick them wisely.
author: Les Brown

quote: What are we doing here, that is the question.
author: Samuel Beckett

quote: Fear is a natural reaction to moving closer to the truth.
author: Pema Chodron

quote: The clock indicates the moment...but what does eternity indicate?
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Learn to enjoy every minute of your life. Be happy now. Don't wait for something outside of yourself to make you happy in the future.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Always forgive your enemies - nothing annoys them so much.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: When you judge others, you do not define them, you define yourself.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: To be heroic is to be courageous enough to die for something; to be inspirational is to be crazy enough to live a little.
author: Criss Jami

quote: In order to carry a positive action, we must develop here a positive vision.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: There are only encounters in history. There are no accidents.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Human behavior flows from three main sources: desire, emotion, and knowledge.
author: Plato

quote: TEAMWORK: the fuel that allows common people attain uncommon results.
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: Never allow a person to tell you no who doesn't have the power to say yes.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Who you are is defined by what you're willing to struggle for.
author: Mark Manson

quote: The most important single ingredient in the formula of success is knowing how to get along with people.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Speak when you are angry - and you'll make the best speech you'll ever regret.
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: Action may not always bring happiness, but there is no happiness without action.
author: William James

quote: To succeed takes more than the desire to win. It also takes the acceptance that we could fail.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: A man with outward courage dares to die: a man with inner courage dares to live.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Whatever we plant in our subconscious mind and nourish with repetition and emotion will one day become reality.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Begin at once to live, and count each separate day as a separate life.
author: Seneca

quote: Sometimes you have to lose all you have to find out who you truly are.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Excuses are the lies you convince yourself are true to avoid proving you are worthy of the gift you were given.
author: Steve Harvey

quote: If you see a get rich quick scheme, that's someone else trying to get rich off of you.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: The Law of Concentration states that whatever you dwell upon grows. The more you think about something, the more it becomes part of your reality.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: If you hang out with chickens, you're going to cluck and if you hang out with eagles, you're going to fly.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: If there's a definition of freedom, I think it's this: living life on your terms.
author: Kamal Ravikant

quote: The first half of life is devoted to forming a healthy ego, the second half is going inward and letting go of it.
author: Carl Jung

quote: Spend eighty percent of your time focusing on the opportunities of tomorrow rather than the problems of yesterday.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: All happiness depends on courage and work.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: Surrender to what is. Let go of what was. Have faith in what will be.
author: Sonia Ricotti

quote: A gentleman is one who puts more into the world than he takes out.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: It doesn't matter where you are, you are nowhere compared to where you can go.
author: Bob Proctor

quote: There is only one way to happiness and that is to cease worrying about things which are beyond the power or our will.
author: Epictetus

quote: When uncomfortable, my instinct is not to avoid the discomfort but to become at peace with it.
author: Josh Waitzkin

quote: Closing your eyes and listening to silence is self-care.
author: Maxime Lagace

quote: He who has overcome his fears will truly be free.
author: Aristotle

quote: The more perfect a person is on the outside, the more demons they have on the inside.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: Friendship is one of the most tangible things in a world which offers fewer and fewer supports.
author: Kenneth Branagh

quote: Leadership is solving problems
author: Colin Powell

quote: We are willing to believe anything other than the truth.
author: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

quote: Wherever you are is the entry point.
author: Kabir

quote: Begin now to be what you will be hereafter.
author: St. Jerome

quote: Make each day your masterpiece.
author: John Wooden

quote: The way to love anything is to realize that it may be lost.
author: Gilbert Chesterton

quote: It is the greatest of all mistakes to do nothing because you can only do little; do something.
author: Sydney Smith

quote: Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
author: Lolly Daskal

quote: Life is and will ever remain an equation incapable of solution, but it contains certain known factors.
author: Nikola Tesla

quote: Everyone has the right to make his own decisions, but none has the right to force his decision on others.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Success is a poor teacher.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Humans and prosperity never endure side by side for long.
author: Herodotus

quote: Genius, in truth, means little more than the faculty of perceiving in an unhabitual way.
author: William James

quote: The difference between winning and losing is most often not quitting.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Being ignorant is not so much a shame, as being unwilling to learn.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Wit is educated insolence.
author: Aristotle

quote: What keeps life fascinating is the constant creativity of the soul.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: Vision is the art of seeing things invisible.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: Happiness is a quality of the soul...not a function of one's material circumstances.
author: Aristotle

quote: Growth comes at the point of resistance.
author: Josh Waitzkin

quote: Words are the clothing of our thoughts.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: Remember to look up at the stars and not down at your feet.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: The less people know, the more stubbornly they know it.
author: Osho

quote: If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: If you don't find the time, if you don't do the work, you don't get the results.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Little minds have little worries, big minds have no time for worries.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Successful people are not without problems. They're simply people who've learned to solve their problems.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Many people spend more time looking at their failures than focusing on their successes.
author: Lolly Daskal

quote: The difference between impossible and possible is a willing heart.
author: Lolly Daskal

quote: Don't be afraid of missing opportunities. Behind every failure is an opportunity somebody wishes they had missed.
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: One loyal friend is worth ten thousand relatives.
author: Euripides

quote: Our attitude toward life determines life's attitude towards us.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: There are no second chances in life, except to feel remorse.
author: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

quote: Choose to be optimistic, it feels better.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Having an open mind is one of the most important qualities we can possess. Once our minds close, we stop evolving.
author: Yanni

quote: Rudeness is the weak man's imitation of strength.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey.
author: Kenji Miyazawa

quote: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Your setback is just a setup for a comeback.
author: Steve Harvey

quote: If someone betrays you once, it's their fault; if they betray you twice, it's your fault.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone elses. life. Don't be trapped by dogma - which is living with the results of other people's thinking.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
author: Colin Powell

quote: In order for you to be the BEST you can be for others, first you must be BEST for yourself.
author: Jeffrey Gitomer

quote: Where does a thought go when it's forgotten?
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: Do all things with love.
author: Og Mandino

quote: The fear of death follows from the fear of life. A man who lives fully is prepared to die at any time.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Life is either a daring adventure, or it is nothing.
author: Helen Keller

quote: What loneliness is more lonely than distrust?
author: George Eliot

quote: The wise man reads both books and life itself.
author: Lin Yutang

quote: A man's worth is no greater than his ambitions.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Don't shortchange yourself when it comes to investing in your own better future.
author: Jim Rohn
